title: Paris2024Colours: Color Palettes Inspired by Paris 2024 Olympic and Paralympic Games — Paris2024Colours-package
Paris 2024 palette generator — paris2024_palette
text: name Name colour palette. Options Logo, OlympicRings, GamesLook. n Number colours palette. Palettes 2 5 colours can used discrete palette. use , use continuous palette. type Usage palette "continuous" "discrete". Continuous usage interpolates colors create scale values. omitted, function assumes continuous n > length palette, discrete n < length palette.
